DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate whether talnetant ( 200mg , 400mg , 600mg ) twice day effective compare placebo risperidone 1-3mg twice day treat positive negative symptom schizophrenia . Study subject treat study drug 6 week return follow-up visit 2 week later . About 275 patient schizophrenia enrol study .
DOC.brief_title: Study Of Talnetant Versus Placebo And Risperidone In Schizophrenia
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Subjects must schizophrenia secondary another medical condition substance abuse . Require inpatient hospitalization . Woman may enroll childbearing potential OR protocolapproved birth control method . Exclusion criterion : Subject first episode schizophrenia . Subject psychotic disorder bipolar disorder . Subject schizophrenia symptom take another medicine drug abuse , due general medical condition . Subject recent history substance dependence/dependence , test positive illicit drug . Subject unstable medical disorder , significant medical disorder include autistic disorder , organic brain disease , liver dysfunction , epilepsy seizure , increase risk develop cerebrovascular problem like stroke . Subject significant abnormality screen test ( ECGs , lab , physical examination , etc. ) . Subject pose current serious suicidal homicidal risk . Subject positive pregnancy test , lactate plan become pregnant within one month study . Subject recently currently participate another clinical study . Subject stabilize current schizophrenia treatment . Subject need take medicine permit study , recently ECT ( electroconvulsive therapy ) TMS ( transcranial magnetic stimulation ) . Subject nonresponsive two adequate trial antipsychotic treatment past 2 year . Subject allergic significant reaction study drug , ca n't take risperidone .
